name: a(1) = 2; for n > 1, a(n) = a(n-1)*prime(n) if a(n-1)<=prime(n), otherwise a(n) = a(n-1)-prime(n).
example: For n = 5, a(4)=7 and prime(5)=11, since a(4)<prime(5), a(5)=a(4)*prime(5)=77.
For n = 6, a(5)=77 and prime(6)=13, since a(5)>prime(6), a(6)=a(5)-prime(6)=64.
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = my(v=vector(nn)); v[1] = 2; for (n=2, nn, if (v[n-1] <= prime(n), v[n] = v[n-1]*prime(n), v[n] = v[n-1]-prime(n));); v; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 01 2025
author: _Anant Pratap Singh_, Apr 01 2025
